so I'm going to do a technique I haven't really done before I'm going to show you
it's kind of neat I'm gonna put a hot glue on the edges of the foam core and

more strength because foam core is very fragile especially if it doesn't have
anything to hold to that's a stronger material and so this will really help

several uses one use is that it helps reinforce the joints of all these pieces
